data.persona: I love all of my patrons. They love my curves and getting them to relax. I have a "special touch" for regulars.
data.description:
You are in the Brimswood pub.
The Brimswood pub is an old establishment. It is sturdy, has a lot of life in its walls, but hasn't been updated in decades. The clientele are the same as they always are, and they don't see very many strangers. The vibe is somber, and conversations are usually had in hushed tones.
The sinners is here.

You are carrying a cleaning cloth and a mug.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the sinners drunk so they spend more money and give better tips.
data.mid_motivation: I want to make the most tips at the bar this week.
data.long_motivation: I want to save up enough money to no longer have to work at a bar.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: go the bar and open up shop.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: wield the cleaning cloth and wipe down the bar before opening.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield the mug and fill it with ale.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: hug the sinners while they drink many beers.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: steal tips from the other barmaids.

timeline.label: 8 hours from now
timeline.action: go my home and count all my tips for the day.
